name: Mind/Machine Interface
tag: The integration of man and machine

quote.text: The Warrior's bland acronym, MMI, obscures the true horror of this monstrosity. Its inventors promise a new era of genius, but meanwhile unscrupulous power brokers use its forcible installation to violate the sanctity of unwilling human minds. They are creating their own private army of demons.

description: Research into Neural Grafting (C4) demonstrated that direct communications between the brain and a digital counterpart are theoretically possible. This Mind/Machine Interface, requested by leaders implementing Doctrine: Air Power (E5) for a new generation of aircraft, bridges the gap between the mechanical and the biological.
